${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:AnnE.NAME: Annihilation Equipment
${modID}:AnnE.FLAVOR: Rosemary holds these heavy swords, swords that only she can use.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play an Attack card, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:StolenMiniCake.NAME: Stolen Mini Cake
${modID}:StolenMiniCake.FLAVOR: A small cake returned by the Doctor. Clearly, Rosemary forgot about this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain [E] .

${modID}:ShoesFromAmiya.NAME: Black Shoes
${modID}:ShoesFromAmiya.FLAVOR: Shoes given by Amiya, they fit perfectly.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 3 Dexterity.

${modID}:Terminal.NAME: Rosemary's Terminal
${modID}:Terminal.FLAVOR: A Rhodes Island customized portable terminal, mainly used for note-taking.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to consume [E] and recall the last card Exhausted.

${modID}:Plant.NAME: Plant Specimen
${modID}:Plant.FLAVOR: An amateur plant specimen, seems like it hasn't been delivered yet.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain 8 Shield.

${modID}:JudgeCount.NAME: Hannibal's Codex
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain
At the start of combat, gain Dexterity equal to the stacks and half of the stacks as Strength.

${modID}:AncientCoin.NAME: Ancient Coin
${modID}:AncientCoin.FLAVOR: Rusted ancient coin, impossible to tell its age. These are seen everywhere in Terra Firma.

${modID}:TheHug.NAME: Perceptual Fusion Apparatus
${modID}:TheHug.FLAVOR: Ensuring Rosemary's abilities to the body remain within controllable ranges.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, all enemies lose 25% HP.

${modID}:TargetHand.NAME: Broken Targeting Hand
${modID}:TargetHand.FLAVOR: Targets, not just for consecutive bullseyes anymore.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain twice the Strength of enemies.

${modID}:Oath.NAME: Finger Pledge
${modID}:Oath.FLAVOR: "We believe in you. We believe in your pledge, little kitten."
DESCRIPTIONS: When Rosemary takes fatal damage, Guardian assists, restoring half of her maximum HP (at least 30) and providing 300 Shield.

${modID}:BadGuy.NAME: "Bad Guy" is Here!
${modID}:BadGuy.FLAVOR: This transport flyer, which incorporates all of Rhodes Island's elite technology, guarantees everything for your journey, making your trip as smooth as a field trip in the wild.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain a regenerating shield that can absorb three #y${modID}:Breakthrough Shield hits. Requires one turn to recharge after each use.

${modID}:DarkMask.NAME: Bizarre Mask
${modID}:DarkMask.FLAVOR: A peculiar mask that does not belong to any known culture, causing individuals to lose their will to fight... and inadvertently fall into deep contemplation.
